You Probably Don't Understand Strandedness and RNA-Sequencing

Honestly, you probably know less than you think you do. I can’t tell you how often I have been bitten in the ass by making an assumption about something I THOUGHT I understood, when in actuallity I was totally missing the point. So, here’s a list a few things you should activly question about.

Do you actually understand strand aware sequencing? Can you draw it out?

#### Are you sure?

If not, this is quick, and totally worth your time. https://www.biostars.org/p/15938/
